name: Impossible Pong (Mevome-Games)
description:
This game is not meant to be serious, it was literally made in 15 minutes but I still hope  you have fun playing it!

Use W and S to move the player (You will need to  click on the game window once to be able to play)

As you can see in the bottom and top left corners, the ball gets faster over time and you have a limited amount of lifes

Make sure to tell us your highscore in the comments!
